question.body: Molecules that are made up of aggregates of fatty elements and bile salts are called:

response.feedback: Incorrect. Lipoprotein lipase is an enzyme in the blood stream that breaks down triglycerides.
Incorrect. Chylomicrons are milky-white droplets of water soluble lipoprotein.
Incorrect. Chyme is a semifluid mixture of partially digested food.
Correct. Micelles are molecules made up of aggregates of fatty elements and bile salts that creates a polar face that can interact with enzymes.
